name: Intimate Confessions
description: Emotional intimacy, deep questions, and soft but charged vulnerability. Build connection through honest conversation.

prompts.text: What's something you've never told anyone about yourself?
Write a love note to your partner describing how they've changed your life.
When did you first realize you were in love with your partner?
Hold your partner's hands while looking into their eyes and share a fear you've never mentioned.
What insecurity do you have that your partner helps you overcome?
Tell your partner three things you love about them that have nothing to do with their appearance.
What's something your partner does that makes you feel truly loved and appreciated?
Ask your partner for their biggest dream and listen without judgment or advice.
What moment with your partner do you replay in your mind when you need comfort?
Describe exactly how you felt the first time your partner said 'I love you.'
Admit one way you've grown or changed because of your relationship.
What's something you've been afraid to tell your partner about your past?
Share a moment when you felt your partner truly understood you.
What's your biggest hope for your future with your partner?
Tell your partner something vulnerable about how they make you feel.
When do you feel most connected to your partner?
Create a 'why I love you' list together and take turns sharing items from it.
What quality of your partner do you wish you had more of?
Describe a moment when you felt truly vulnerable with your partner and what happened.
What's the deepest fear you have about your relationship?
